circumstances:
The airplane departed RAF Elsham Wolds at 2340LT on July 24 on an operation to Emden. Passing over the Netherlands, it was shot down by a German fighter and crashed near the village of Easterwierrum. All six crew members were killed. 
crew:
P/O Mervyn Sydney Lund, pilot, 
Sgt Arthur Edward Owen, pilot, 
Sgt John James Cox, observer, 
Sgt Alfred John Le Poidevin, wireless operator, 
Sgt Roy Penry Williams, wireless operator, 
Sgt Frank Gordon Walker, air gunner.
probable_cause: Shot down by a German fighter.
